item.description:
Hi Energy fans, just wanted to give you a heads up and let everyone know that we will be attending a lecture at UNH, we will listen to Edward Cherian talk about Iberdrola renewables here is the info:

Mr. Cherian directs wind power development activities for Iberdrola in the New England region. Iberdrola is the largest wind power company in the world, and has expanded operations in the U.S. in the last few years. Mr. Cherian is the Project Manager for the Lempster Wind Project, the first commercial wind farm in New Hampshire. The Lempster project is scheduled to be fully operational by the end of 2008, and will produce enough emission-free electricity for over 10,000 average NH homes. Prior to working for Iberdrola, Mr. Cherian worked for engineering and environmental consulting companies in New Hampshire and elsewhere.

Hope to see everyone there!

Peter
item.name: Wind Farm Lecture
